selections.name: Impending Fury
selections.reason: Best of a weak bunch. Ran a solid 2nd at Strathalbyn two starts back and wasn't disgraced in 4th last time out. Finds a very winnable maiden here.

selections.name: Sir Aali
selections.reason: Has shown glimpses of ability with placings in the past. In a field this thin, his experience counts for something.

selections.name: Kohala
selections.reason: Finished 5th last start but not beaten far. Step up in distance might suit.

selections.name: Caer Ibormeith
selections.reason: Ran 4th at Gawler last start. Can improve from a good draw.

danger_horse.name: Sir Aali
danger_horse.reason: Consistent enough to threaten if the top pick falters.

selections.name: Debralee
selections.reason: Standout form in this field. Placed 2nd and 3rd in last two starts. Despite the wide draw, she has the speed to overcome it against limited opposition.

selections.name: Social Dancer
selections.reason: Consistent type who ran 2nd at Port Lincoln recently. Drawn well and should be in the finish.

selections.name: Vasilias
selections.reason: Has shown some ability in previous preps. Watch for market moves.

selections.name: Petit Chautauq
selections.reason: Lightly raced and could improve here.

danger_horse.name: Social Dancer
danger_horse.reason: Recent placing suggests she is nearing a win and gets a soft run from barrier 3.

selections.name: Santasia
selections.reason: Very consistent mare with 9 seconds and 5 thirds. Placed in her last two starts and brings the strongest form lines into this Class 1.

selections.name: Ruled By Thieves
selections.reason: Broke maiden status impressively last start. Has upside and draws well.

selections.name: Flirt
selections.reason: Won maiden before spell. Resumes here and could be sharp fresh.

selections.name: Nadege
selections.reason: Resuming from a good gate. Has placed in this grade before.

danger_horse.name: Ruled By Thieves
danger_horse.reason: Last start winner who could go on with it now confidence is high.

selections.name: Normie No Show
selections.reason: Ran a solid 3rd last start at this track/distance range. In a very weak 0-54, that form reads well.

selections.name: Hotch Potch
selections.reason: Lightly raced compared to rivals. 4th last start shows he is competitive.

selections.name: Crown And Anchor
selections.reason: Has been around the mark without winning. Place chance in this grade.

selections.name: Tofino
selections.reason: Drops into a very winnable race. 7th last start wasn't terrible.

danger_horse.name: Hotch Potch
danger_horse.reason: Less exposed than the rest and has scope for improvement.

selections.name: Strawberry Swing
selections.reason: Last start winner at Port Lincoln. Maintains form well and looks the one to beat again in this 0-56 grade.

selections.name: Samanth
selections.reason: Runner-up last start. Consistent mare who draws perfectly in barrier 2 to challenge.

selections.name: Lady Memphis
selections.reason: Finished 4th last start. Competitive at this level.

selections.name: Aspenado
selections.reason: Drops in class and has won 3 races. Respect.

danger_horse.name: Samanth
danger_horse.reason: Honest performer who won't be far away from the good draw.

selections.name: Bulls On Parade
selections.reason: Coming off a nice win at Port Lincoln. Confidence is up and this field isn't much harder.

selections.name: The Hass
selections.reason: Finished 4th last start. Drawn the rails and should get a lovely run.

selections.name: A Thousand Degrees
selections.reason: Veteran who showed he still has it with a 3rd last start. Good barrier.

selections.name: Royal Trapeze
selections.reason: Has won 3 races. 5th last start was okay. Each way claims.

danger_horse.name: The Hass
danger_horse.reason: Consistent type who maps to get the run of the race.

selections.name: Hateschoolconcerts
selections.reason: Ran a good 2nd last start at Oakbank. That form is superior to most here. Looks the value play.

selections.name: Ambello
selections.reason: Experienced campaigner who ran 4th last start. Always competitive in this grade.

selections.name: Sacred Chord
selections.reason: Finished 4th recently. Consistent around the placings.

selections.name: Mr Jones
selections.reason: Drawn well and has placed in this grade before.

danger_horse.name: Ambello
danger_horse.reason: Has the class to win this if he can overcome the wide barrier.
